page.title: 17HOUSING
page.content: Although much of this area is taken up by the{Ashdown Forest}there are many large and expensive properties. Most of the houses are detached and are situated in well landscaped gardens. Those that border the{Royal Ashdown {Golf}course or the{Ashdown Forest}are particularly expensive. Nearer the village the semi-detatched, terraced and well-kept Council houses are to be found, but these too, tend to be more expensive than something similar in another part of the county.In Michaelfields, there are a collection of very interesting houses built in an unusual style reflecting the influence of the Anthroposophical movement which is so evident in this area. Many of the houses reflect the history of area and are built with attractive natural materials.
